inputs.tutorial: Specifies the HTTP listening port from the Cluster.
inputs.label: Type the HTTP listening port:
inputs.name: http_port

inputs.tutorial: Specifies the HTTPS listening port from the Cluster.
inputs.label: Type the HTTPS listening port:
inputs.name: https_port

inputs.tutorial: Specifies the quantity of Worker nodes.
inputs.label: Type the quantity of Worker Nodes:
inputs.name: worker_nodes

inputs.tutorial: Enable Traefik by default in Cluster.
inputs.label: Enable Traefik ingress controller ?
inputs.name: enable_traefik
